package.name: seqdb-py
package.readme:
This tool (delete_seqdb_features) is packaged as part of seqdb-py distribution.
Required Galaxy packages: python-devel
This dependency definition creates a virtual environment (virtualenv) and installs seqdb-py into the virtual environment directly from bitbucket. The tool can then be executed by running:
delete_seqdb_features
which is defined as an entry point to seqdb-py and can be executed from any system location.
